@xJaagrav @Netlify What a rollercoaster! Behind the scenes Netlify Functions are AWS Lambda. Just with lots of DX workflow sugar. Serverless functions can be very efficient and performant, but much depends on your use case and implementation. Shame they're not the right fit for your project.
